meanings.definition: More squashy or soft in texture.
meanings.sent1: The pillow felt squashier after I fluffed it up.
meanings.sent2: The ripe peach was squashier than the unripe one.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sit on the squashier side of the couch, but it kept swallowing me whole!
meanings.sent4: The clouds looked squashier than cotton candy in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Her cheeks were as squashier as marshmallows, making them irresistible to pinch.

meanings.sent1: This sponge is squashier than the one we used yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The mud in the garden was getting squashier with each rain shower.
meanings.sent3: The squashier soap bar slipped out of my hands and landed in the bathtub with a splash.
meanings.sent4: The squashier dough was easier to mold into different shapes.
meanings.sent5: The squashier fabric draped beautifully over the furniture, giving it a cozy look.
